one_reviews_text: Tried reinstalling oculus and reinstalled game 3 times. Also reinstalled all oculus drivers 2-3 times and still get a white screen at loadout, cant even get to loading screen? help? Pc meets all the min requirements for game and also have latest nvidia drivers.

I actually expected more out of this game, it's very basic wave shooter with zero new mechanic. The difficulty is above average, the enemies just keep spawning and are bullet sponges. The guns doesnt feel great to shoot and 2 handed weapons are a literal pain to use because you can't ungrab the left hand and if you need to rest your arm (which you will need) you basically cant keep shooting because it's stuck to your controller. I will say the graphic is pretty nice (performance, not so much) and the voice acting story is decent to good.
all text broken

Illogical, implausible, immensely entertaining.

When you played cowboys and Indians as a kid did you ever run out of bullets? Same here. Insane amounts of enemies and enough ammo to take them on. Want gritty realism? Forget it. Want a true old West SIM? Look elsewhere. Want fun and a bit of a challenge? This is it.

Issues? Learning to aim the two handed weapons isn't easy. Another review blames tracking but it's getting the hang of positioning your hands as if holding one longer weapon that's the problem. One of the arcade levels where you have to stop bad guys getting into the brothel always locks up in the Rift version. It should be able to track scores between the rift and quest versions so improvements don't have to be made on both platforms.

Minor niggles and don't stop the game being the most fun I've had in a game in years.

Tracking did not work well with two handed gun (Saturnine sammy). Decreased difficulty to easy and still could not aim accurately at enemies on the right and left. Would prefer to switch back to pistols but not an option.
For the money, this is a great game. You don’t have to move around, or even reload...you just shoot people.

The animations are still so super-clunky and the gun-play isn´t really precise, neither hitting the enemies is satisfying. I played indie games, like Containment Initiative, which are very intense too, but not that chaotic and haphazard.
No reloading, with those revolvers for example.. it´s like these shooters you could play in those penny arcades.. Not 4 Dollars or Euros worth. 

Watch gameplay before buy!

didnt feel I was ripped off when I played this, graphics are nice, aiming is good, funny story, like an arcade shooter but VR making it even more fun, pick up and play type game and well made not like the cheap rubbish we all keep buying because it got one good review, probably from the dev.
Great game at a great price. Arcade shoot out fun, Also, I would like to thank the game developers for making this cross buy. Top stuff, Grab it!

I have a Quest with OculusLink so am able to play Rift games. Guns & Stories is the most fun I've had with VR. Being able to go postal in a wild west town is such a blast. I haven't played it all the way through in fact I'm only on the first level but what I've experienced already has made this my favorite Rift game. With a $12 USB-3 cable it runs great and I don't see any artifacts or drop in graphics quality at all. Please consider expanding or bringing out a sequel; some time you just want to have fun rather than play more intense shooters. One question, is there any way to save your progress?
review_feedback: Thanks for your review. All levels completed in the lobby are already available and you can start at any time from the moment you left off.

review_title: Fun Game And All Credit To Developers
one_reviews_text: The game has good graphics, its fun to play, it has a good pace and a good interface. I'm  especially impressed how the developers responded to my initial problem and resolved it. Thank you :-)
review_feedback: Always happy to help, thanks for your patience.

review_title: I want to like it, but..
one_reviews_text:
At first I few levels I thought it was ok. The visuals are nice and I generally love western.
But the trigger issues many people are reporting (only 1/3 triggers actually fires a shot), together with sub-par aiming and tracking is game breaking. 
I still forced myself to play through the game, but at the final boss fight (after the first 4 jumps) it keeps failing to spawn any more enemies and so I can't even finish it..
review_feedback: We fixed this bug. Please download the update and enjoy the game! Thank you for your patience

one_reviews_text:
And also 5 stars for the developers good service!
after trouble whit the gun i contact the developers the responded quickly an took the complaint very seriously and have it fixed whit a update.
review_feedback: Always happy to help, thanks for your patience.

one_reviews_text: Played the first level, died and uninstalled the game. You may ask what happened. To make it short - it was a really exhausting experience. About 100000 enemies are running at you to hit you and shooting at you in an endless stream and you have to fire every single bullet manually that the fingers are starting to hurt. I mean - graphically its wonderful. I love the theme, the music etc. - but (at least the first level) is very frustrating and I don't wanted to go on :(
review_feedback: We are very sorry that it seemed hard for you( Try playing for less difficulty and you will definitely like it)

one_reviews_text:
its a fun game to play with your mates but its not a push for vr.
Grab a few drinks and have a laugh , graphically ok and quite funny at times.
the demo is good the full game is brill

review_title: No doubt one of the best VR games
one_reviews_text: Lots of funny hours shooting bad guys.... That's what you've got. Real nice game!!! I love it. My kids too!!! Fast paced action game... Don't think. Buy it now!!! Mandatory content for any happy VR user!!!
Was having sound issues but the developer helped me out and solved the issue.  Game is a fun little Western style shooter.  Having a good time with it.  Very solid title!
review_feedback: We are always happy to help! Thank you for being with us!

one_reviews_text: The game takes very long to download and install and after that Oculus says not installed and I have to redo it all. Tried 4 times in 2 days, still unable to install.
review_feedback: We fixed this bug. Download the game update and enjoy!

one_reviews_text: Edit: I finally was able to install it. Fun and beautiful game to play
review_feedback: We are always happy to help! Thank you for being with us!

one_reviews_text:
I can't download the software. When i press the Install button from oculus, a message appear: 
The antivirus blocked the software installation. But i got no antivirus (only windows defender here) and i can download and upgrade the other software. So the problem is only with this game. FIrst time i see this problem


Any suggestion?

****
Thx for the fast reply! It worked!
review_feedback: Sorry for having this problem. Please disconnect Windows Defender during installation and everything will be fine. He is very picky about games from time to time.There is nothing harmful in the game, this is some kind of mistake.

review_title: Fun western theme with modern weapons
one_reviews_text:
Guns n Stories has an arcade feel with a western theme. 
I enjoyed the modern twist on the weapons which kept me from getting bored with just a regular 6 shooter.
The characters or enemies come out from different places and the player just keeps shooting.
There’s a simplicity to this game  (which doesn’t mean that it is a simple game or that the developer did not work hard on it. I can see that much work went into it.) 
I can play with out having to concentrate on puzzles or looking behind me all the time. A relief after a had day. 
Although a bit cheesy... (but cheesy is fun) the story line is creative. 
I am happy that I can skip the narration when desired for non repetitive re-playability.  
 The game gets harder with more creative enemies. I also like that you can shoot anything else you can see; (ie: bottles)for extra shooting fun.
The arm work out in the harder levels is an extra benefit. 

FEEDBACK/NOTE TO DEVELOPER:
In the first act, and the first section... starting shortly before the boy is talking about the jokes Grandpa makes.... It sounds like there are 2 sound tracks overlapping each other. Very distracting. I replayed the level and it happens every time.

The demo worked fine but I just bought it and it refuses to play now ! It says I've to uninstall but I can't uninstall anymore because the option uninstall is not there anymore, I only have the option to install and when I click on it, it starts installing then says that there is a problem and that's it. Each time I try to install, it's the same thing going on again. Come on ! We're not beta testers ! I work in the IT industry, you guys have to test your stuff first before making people pay for it just to find out it doesn't work correctly...
review_feedback:
Hello dear cowboy! Take our regrets that you have encountered such a problem :( You are first who met this issue, other reviews admit that the game working fine. Let us help solve your problem, give us more information please by filling this form: https://forms.gle/6oxbRBkXqZ26p9gM8
And we will contact you to help.

one_reviews_text: It is a game that is full of fun, and can be played again and again. Realistic? no! but does it matter? no!!!. it's not real life, it is escapism. And done very well. Thank you to the dev's.
Super funny and addictive :)

I love it from the preface, excelent story, excelent inmersion and excelent gameplay.
Each gun better than the other one, a multiplayer as dead buried is needded!! 

Great job guys!

Wasn't sure what to expect with this one but I must say it was a very nice surprize!  Tons of fast action shooting fun!  If you were lucky enough to get it on sale, like I did, then you got a super deal; still worth full price though.  (I don't remember saying that about any other games I got on sale)  

The starting room took me 10 minutes to get out of; not very intuitive user interface, but still not enough to drop this one to 4 stars.  (HINT: Grab the first statue on the desk with your left hand by pulling your left trigger...then point to the mission on the statue in your left hand with your right hand and finally pull and 'hold' the trigger on your right hand until you see the white bar fill up. - hopefully that will save someone a headache)

Shooting is very chalaging yet still very fun.  Graphics look great.  Has a great  arcade feel.  This is also a great arm workout, whew!  All around very cool game!!  One of my wife's favorite VR games as well.  Definitely recommended.

The Oculus Store demo (Preface) looked promissing, and the full version delivers.

5-stars if you're looking for a fun cowboy-themed wave shooter.
Great wave shooter, some funny dialog, and a story to boot. Graphics, voice acting is well done.

This was an absolute blast! If you're looking for a study-level sim, with accurate ballistics and wound-cavity behavior of the .45 LC cartridge, historically-relevant themes or whatever, and you're one of those blistering pains in the nu*$ that you want to bludgeon to death during a movie because you take yourself, and everything else in life, too seriously (like a certain reviewer who shall remain nameless), and can't resist saying "oh that's not very realistic" every 22 seconds, this is probably not for you. On the other hand, if you're a relatively normal human being who likes to have fun, and can appreciate things for what they're intended to be, you'll LOVE this! It's funny, entertaining, and there's the real visceral satisfaction of endlessly flinging tons of lead at a never-ending swarm of "bad guys". I now have over 200 of these VR games, and grow bored pretty quickly with most of them, but not this one! Hell, even my family enjoyed watching it on the monitor while I played!
i bought it in the sale and it was totaly worth it, but if you would have to pay 20 bux you would be really wanting to buy it, but if u buy it it is going to be a lot of fun
Cool game! Just press start and shoot em alll!! Nice story, simple ballistic, and great optimization. And russian language! Thanks for this game!!
That's right - one of the best VR shooting games. For me on the 2nd position after Codename: Phantom

This is a mediocre wave shooter set in a western world that's all about shooting stuff several times.  It has some nice qualities and some bad ones.  First and foremost, there's a story to the game.  It's about a grandpa telling tall tales to his grandson who fetches his grandpa more beer to hear more of his story.  That's already pretty unrealistic, but let's go with it anyways.  Currently there are two levels with three stages each (and a coming third level).  There's some rudimentary animations on a movie screen before each stage while you can eat popcorn.  You can also just skip it.  My main problem with the game is that although there is some variety, there's also a lot of repetition.  I started to hate my handguns.  You have to press trigger over and over to take down targets.  It feels like maybe you're shooting spit balls and it looks like it too, at least the 16 bit version.  The bullet physics are pathetic.  There are different enemy types, but it usually doesn't matter.  They either run up to you like idiots, or snipe at you behind cover.  You do break up the monotony when you get a repeater handgun and enemies start throwing dynamite and rpgs at you and drones start flying about, but it's just bullet sponge versus bullet sponge in the end.  Finally, you get a boss fight, but it was more of the same only a bigger bullet sponge.  I guess on a deep sale you might want to get this, but there's better versions of this game.  Saloon Showdown VR is the best western shooter in VR.  High Noon VR is also just about better in every way than this game.  And of course, Dead and Buried is amazing with friends.  Get those instead is my advice.
review_feedback:
We have already responded to such a letter earlier :)
With the mention of the same games that are supposedly better than ours.
This is a cheap trick that does not honor High Noon, or whoever you represent.

But it is not difficult for us to respond to your feedback, even for the second time. We will also answer in the third time, and so on, especially since players can try our game (Guns'n'Stories: Preface) before purchasing and decide for ourselves whether the game is pleasant or not.

"We love games and want to make a VR-gaming enjoyable and widespread. That is why we wanted to create a simple, fun and dynamic game, in which people could fall out of reality for a short time and get fresh and bright emotions that can be experienced only in childhood. Pure fun!


Our cowboys comes from Hollywood, so they do not waste time for reloading weapons, can dodge bullets and easily deal with hordes fearsome, but invariably comical enemies.



You will not be languish with the boredom and monotony of traditional westerns, because we added to the game an impressive arsenal of firearms, throwing weapons, and even futuristic weapons.



Those of you who will not skip storyline will be able to see in the game more than the "regular wave shooter." (Take advantage of this to take a breath after the heated shootings).

We are sure that you will appreciate the diversity of locations, the jokes of old Bill and the driving soundtrack of the western and blues rock.


Yes, with unaccustomed you can get tired legs, hands and especially your fingers, but  true immersion in another world must to respond to all our senses. Isn't it?
"Mobilis in Mobili""

one_reviews_text: great game! played not so much, but full of impressions! This shooter - the only one and not repeatable in its own way! very addictive graphics and gameplay. management in the game is very convenient. super!
This game is good, but I started to enjoy playing it by the end of the first act. But when I finished the first act I couldn't help but fell in love with it!

... it took me a few minutes to start the game after being stuck at the desk and I see there's a few people who are also stuck here. Reach out and pick up one of the Act figures by pressing the index finger trigger. Then select which part of the story you want to load by pointing and pressing the index finger trigger on the other hand. The game is a lot of fun and good for a quick short blast. It's essentially a wave shooter and there's a lot to get through before you can progress to the next level. The story element is nice and adds a bit of variety, as does Grandpa' voiceover during the game. I enjoyed playing this and apart from the difficulty getting things started initially it's been an enjoyable blast in VR.
review_feedback: Thanks for your feedback! We are very glad that you liked the game and we will do our best to make it even better!

one_reviews_text: Had a Rift for a couple of weeks now, and have been playing various games to see what they are like. Was very impressed with this, a good (if not silly) story, loads of targets and great gameplay. Is quite short, but has great replayability - especially if you have friends round, and compete to see who can get the best score on certain scenarios (and leap around like a lunatic).
review_feedback: Thanks for the feedback. It is very important for us. We are very pleased that you liked the game.

one_reviews_text:
One of the best VR shooters in its category. Dynamically, colorful and funny. Interesting vision of western. 
At times the gameplay is slightly monotonous, but basically very addictive!﻿

I have never gotten beyond the desk. No matter what button I press or anything . I contacted the dev's and they told me to uninstall and reinstall.    I DID THAT.. It STILL does not work... DO NOT BUY . ! Known issue   NO FIX
review_feedback:
Hello!
Thanks for contacting. Please provide your email and we will contact you. We strive to improve our game, so your feedback is very important to us. You wrote that you received instructions from the developers. Tell me please how was the correspondence going on? If I find it, it will help us shorten the time of problem search.

You can also fill out the form to tell us about the problem.
We will try to solve it as soon as possible.
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdu6nQFBQ5nwWdk_wjSj6gg2y1TBS43d3IJkr6irfS_CZIMXw/viewform

one_reviews_text:
If your grandpa once filled your ear with nonsense, this might take you back.  If your grandpa was a drunk, then at least now you don't have to smell him while pretending to listen.

A lot of fun with TF 2 style baddies rushing you while you're trying to keep blood pumping to your trigger fingers.  Episode three of the first story is where I had my first "laugh like a child moment."  Easily worth the sale price.  With more content added, easily worth the regular price.
review_feedback: Thanks for the feedback!We try to make the game better!

one_reviews_text: Very enjoyable shooter game - don't buy for mindless action as the story is part ofthe fun.  Not particularly lengthy right now but more content was added for free recently and more promised to be on the way. No lefthanded mode which makes some levels more difficult than they should be.
review_feedback:
Hello! 
Thanks for your feedback.
The game is in early accesses now, and 3 Act will be add soon.

one_reviews_text:
Got this running after a bit of trouble.Turned out Comodo was blocking it from running.All sorted now
Loving this game so far,particularly as i have little room to play in.I can mostly stay put and dodge `most` bullets.
Well worth the money,
Lots of Fun,mindless shooter(No Insult intended) with a good,fun story being narrated to you
review_feedback:
Thank you!
We are very glad that you liked it and try to do our best!

one_reviews_text:
Sometimes you're just in the mood for a dumb game with a corny sense of humour, where you shoot lots of bad guys, soak up bullets like a sponge, and make stupid wisecracks. 
If that's what you're after, look no further. Guns'n'Stories follows in the footsteps of games like Redneck Rampage, Duke Nukem 3D, and Serious Sam, and while it's short (for now), it's a hell of a lot of fun.
review_feedback:
Hello! 
Thank you for feedback! Humor is the basic focus on game. Enjoy it.

one_reviews_text: Quite possably the most nonsensical wave shooter ever created.   Just turn your brain off, go with the flow and enjoy it.
review_feedback:
Thank you! 
We attach great importance to the storyline.
